articles.title: NWSL’s Boston Legacy FC will play some 2026 games in Rhode Island due to Gillette Stadium conflicts
articles.description:
As construction continues on White Stadium in Franklin Park, the future home of the NWSL’s Boston Legacy FC, the club will play the majority of its 2026 season at Gillette Stadium. But due to scheduling demands brought on by the 2026 men’s World Cup, the team will also play a select number of games at […]

The post NWSL’s Boston Legacy FC will play some 2026 games in Rhode Island due to Gillette Stadium conflicts appeared first on Boston.com.
